title: Presidential Address to the Federal Assembly
content:
The West has opened the door for the Nazis to return to Ukraine. They have turned Ukraine into an anti-Russia, a springboard for aggression against our country. The Ukrainian people have become hostages of the Kyiv regime and its Western handlers, who have effectively occupied the country.​
AP News

They are not hiding their goal: the strategic defeat of Russia. That is, to finish us off once and for all. In other words, they plan to turn a local conflict into a phase of global confrontation. This is exactly how we understand it, and we will respond accordingly.​

We are not fighting the Ukrainian people. The Ukrainian people have become hostages of the Kyiv regime and its Western masters, which have effectively occupied the country.​
AP News

The responsibility for fueling the Ukrainian conflict, for its escalation, for the number of victims... lies entirely with the Western elites and, of course, with the current Kyiv regime, for which the Ukrainian people are essentially strangers.​

They are not hiding their goal: the strategic defeat of Russia. That is, to finish us off once and for all. In other words, they plan to turn a local conflict into a phase of global confrontation. This is exactly how we understand it, and we will respond accordingly.​

We are not fighting the Ukrainian people. The Ukrainian people have become hostages of the Kyiv regime and its Western masters, which have effectively occupied the country.​
AP News

The responsibility for fueling the Ukrainian conflict, for its escalation, for the number of victims... lies entirely with the Western elites and, of course, with the current Kyiv regime, for which the Ukrainian people are essentially strangers.
